content: podaca slouchy crochet beanie is a great pattern to work on to create a warm and stylish beanie the combination of stitches makes it a modern crochet accessory i have used a really fun purl single_crochet stitch this stitch gives the fabric an interesting look with a subtle texture the beanie also uses round of mock ribbing using half_double_crochet you simply alternate front post and back post stitches to create it it uses a standard dk weight yarn so you can definitely go stash diving for this pattern **materials** scheepjes color crafter dk weight 100% premium acrylic 300m /328 yards per 100g ball x 1 ball in willis 1829 4 mm crochet hook pom pom maker faux fur pom pom yarn needle scissors **gauge** 18 sts x 13 5 rnds = 4 x 4 inch /10 x 10 cm measured of purl single_crochet worked in round **finished size** finished hat measures 18 5 inch /47 cm circumference x 10 inch /25 5 cm hat height to fit a head circumference up to 22 inch /56 5 cm if you would like to keep up
